summary: Tel?iai County is a designated administrative region within the Republic of Lithuania, classified under the broader category of "regions of EU Member States." In the context of EU legal and regulatory frameworks, Tel?iai County plays a significant role in regional governance, facilitating the implementation of EU policies at the local level. This region is subject to various EU regulations aimed at promoting cohesion, sustainable development, and regional identity. As part of the EU's commitment to regional diversity, Tel?iai County exemplifies the integration of local governance structures within the overarching EU legal system, ensuring compliance with both national and EU directives.
